response: While an exact number of stray cats in Valley Ranch is not provided, the City of Irving, which encompasses Valley Ranch, has a "vast population of feral cats." To manage this population, Irving Animal Services offers a Trap, Neuter, Release (TNR) program. Although the city's direct TNR program is currently suspended due to illnesses at the shelter, residents can obtain vouchers that cover the cost of spaying/neutering, rabies vaccinations, and ear-tipping for feral cats.
